source_sentence: ◎妙音菩薩品第二十三
translation: Śubhavyūha-bodhisattva Chapter 23

source_sentence: 爾時釋迦牟尼佛，放大人相肉髻光明，及放眉間白毫相光，遍照東方百八萬億那由他恒河沙等諸佛世界。
translation: At the time, Śākyamuni Buddha magnified his human-appearing flesh topknot and radiated a white-haired radiance between his eyebrows, shining everywhere in the east in a hundred and eight thousand million nayutas of Gaṅgāsā and other Buddha-realms.

source_sentence: 過是數已有世界，名淨光莊嚴，其國有佛，號淨華宿王智如來、應供、正遍知、明行足、善逝、世間解、無上士、調御丈夫、天人師、佛、世尊，為無量無邊菩薩大眾，恭敬圍繞而為說法。
translation: There are countless other worlds that have been named Vairocana-raśmi-pratimaṇḍitā, in which there's a Buddha named Jñānacana-abhisa-rāja-tathāgata, Worthy of Offerings, Perfectly Omniscient, Perfect in Knowledge, Well Gone, Understander of the World, Unsurpassed Person, Trainer of Husbands, Teacher of Gods and People, Buddha, and World Honored One, who respectfully surrounds an immeasurable and limitless assembly of bodhisattvas and preaches to them.

source_sentence: 釋迦牟尼佛白毫光明，遍照其國。
translation: Śākyamuni Buddha's white-haired radiance shone throughout his kingdom.

source_sentence: 爾時一切淨光莊嚴國中，有一菩薩，名曰妙音，久已殖眾德本，供養親近無量百千萬億諸佛，而悉成就甚深智慧，得妙幢相三昧、法華三昧、淨德三昧、宿王戲三昧、無緣三昧、智印三昧、解一切眾生語言三昧、集一切功德三昧、清淨三昧、神通遊戲三昧、慧炬三昧、莊嚴王三昧、淨光明三昧、淨藏三昧、不共三昧、日旋三昧、得如是等百千萬億恒河沙等諸大三昧。
translation: At the time, there was a bodhisattva named Sumeru, who had long accumulated the roots of many virtues, made offerings to and become intimate with measureless hundreds of thousands of millions of buddhas, and had accomplished profound wisdom, attained the marvelous banner-sign samādhi, dharma-flower samādhi, pure virtue samādhi, host-ruler play samādhi, unconditioned samādhi, wisdom-seal samādhi, concentration of understanding the speech of all sentient beings, concentration of collecting all merits, purity samādhi, miraculous play samādhi, wisdom-torch samādhi, vajra-ruler samādhi, pure light samādhi, pure store samādhi, uncommon samādhi, sun-spinning samādhi, and attained these hundreds of thousands of thousands of millions of great samādhis like this one.

source_sentence: 釋迦牟尼佛光照其身，即白淨華宿王智佛言：「世尊！
translation: Śakyamūṇi Buddha shone his light on his body and said to the Pure Flower King of Constellations, the Buddha of Wisdom, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我當往詣娑婆世界，禮拜親近供養釋迦牟尼佛，及見文殊師利法王子菩薩、藥王菩薩、勇施菩薩、宿王華菩薩、上行意菩薩、莊嚴王菩薩、藥上菩薩。」
translation: I will go to the Śākyamuni world, venerate and make offerings to Śākyamuni Buddha, and meet Mañjuśrī, the Dharma Prince Bodhisattva, the Medicine King Bodhisattva, the Courageous Giving Bodhisattva, the Constellation King Flower Bodhisattva, the Superior Acting Mind Bodhisattva, the Adorned King Bodhisattva, and the Superior Medicine Bodhisattva."

source_sentence: 爾時淨華宿王智佛告妙音菩薩：「汝往，莫輕彼國生下劣想。
translation: It was then that the Pure Flower King of Constellations Buddha of Wisdom addressed the Bodhisattva Miaoyin, "Go, and don't despise that country and give rise to inferior notions.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 彼娑婆世界高下不平，土石諸山穢惡充滿，佛身卑小，諸菩薩眾其形亦小，而汝身四萬二千由旬，我身六百八十萬由旬，汝身第一端正，百千萬福光明殊妙，是故汝往莫輕彼國，若佛菩薩及國土生下劣想。」
translation: The height of that sahā world is uneven, the dirt and rocks and mountains are filled with filth and evil, the body of the Buddha is small, and so are the forms of the bodhisattvas.

source_sentence: 妙音菩薩白其佛言：「世尊！
translation: The Marvelous Sound Bodhisattva said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我今詣娑婆世界，皆是如來之力，如來神通遊戲，如來功德智慧莊嚴。」
translation: My present visit to the Śāmba world is due to the Tathāgata's power, the Tathāgata's miraculous play, and the Tathāgata's adornment of merit and wisdom."

source_sentence: 於是妙音菩薩，不起于座，身不動搖而入三昧，以三昧力，於耆闍崛山去法座不遠，化作八萬四千眾寶蓮華，閻浮檀金為莖，白銀為葉，金剛為鬚，甄叔迦寶以為其臺。
translation: Then, without rising from his seat, Sumati Bodhisattva entered samādhi with the power of samādhi, and not far from his Dharma throne on Mount Gṛdhrakūṭa, he transformed into 84,000 lotus flowers made of various jewels, with gold stalks made of jambūṭa, silver leaves made of white, adamantine beards, and jewels of the jambūṭa family as their pedestal.

source_sentence: 爾時文殊師利法王子，見是蓮華而白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that Mañjuśrī, the Dharma prince, saw these lotus flowers and said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是何因緣先現此瑞，有若干千萬蓮華，閻浮檀金為莖，白銀為葉，金剛為鬚，甄叔迦寶以為其臺。」
translation: What were the causes for this first appearance, when there were tens of millions of lotus flowers with gold stalks made of jambu trees, silver leaves, adamantine beards, and jewels made of janshuka for their pedestals?"

source_sentence: 爾時釋迦牟尼佛告文殊師利：「是妙音菩薩摩訶薩，欲從淨華宿王智佛國，與八萬四千菩薩圍遶，而來至此娑婆世界，供養親近禮拜於我，亦欲供養聽《法華經》。」
translation: It was then that Śākyamuni addressed Mañjuśrī, "This is the Marvelous Sound Bodhisattva Mahāsattva who wants to come from the Pure Land of the Flower Constellation King of Wisdom Buddhas, surrounded by 84,000 bodhisattvas, to this Saha World to make offerings, become intimate with me, and venerate me, and also to make offerings and listen to the Lotus Sutra."

source_sentence: 文殊師利白佛言：「世尊！
translation: Mañjuśrī said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是菩薩種何善本，修何功德，而能有是大神通力？
translation: What good roots and virtues does the bodhisattva cultivate that make it possible to have this great supernormal power?

source_sentence: 行何三昧？
translation: What kind of samādhi does one practice?

source_sentence: 願為我等說是三昧名字，我等亦欲勤修行之，行此三昧，乃能見是菩薩色相大小威儀進止。
translation: Please explain the name of this concentration for us, and we also want to diligently practice it so that we can see this bodhisattva's appearance, size, manner, and movement when we practice this concentration.

source_sentence: 惟願世尊，以神通力，彼菩薩來，令我得見。」
translation: May the Bhagavān, with supernormal powers, allow us to see that bodhisattva when he comes."

source_sentence: 爾時釋迦牟尼佛告文殊師利：「此久滅度多寶如來，當為汝等而現其相。」
translation: It was then that Śākyamuni addressed Mañjuśrī, "This long-extinct Tathāgata of Many Treasures will show his form for you."

source_sentence: 時多寶佛告彼菩薩：「善男子！
translation: The Tathāgata Buddha then addressed the bodhisattva, "Good sons!

source_sentence: 來，文殊師利法王子欲見汝身。」
translation: Come, Mañjuśrī, Prince of the Dharma, who wants to see you in person."

source_sentence: 于時妙音菩薩於彼國沒，與八萬四千菩薩俱共發來，所經諸國六種震動，皆悉雨於七寶蓮華，百千天樂不鼓自鳴。
translation: At the time, the Sumati-dārikā bodhisattva had gone into that country and come together with 84,000 other bodhisattvas, and the countries they passed through were shaken in six ways, all raining down seven-jeweled lotus flowers, and a hundred thousand celestial musicians sounded themselves without drumming.

source_sentence: 是菩薩，目如廣大青蓮華葉，正使和合百千萬月，其面貌端正復過於此；身真金色，無量百千功德莊嚴，威德熾盛光明照曜，諸相具足；如那羅延堅固之身，入七寶臺上昇虛空，去地七多羅樹；諸菩薩眾恭敬圍繞，而來詣此娑婆世界耆闍崛山。
translation: That bodhisattva, with eyes like the vast blue lotus leaves that correctly combine a million moons, has a more correct appearance than this one; his body is truly golden, adorned with measureless hundreds of thousands of attributes, his authority is blazing, his light shines, and his features are complete; he enters the seven-jeweled dais like the sturdy body of Narayan, ascends into the sky, and leaves the ground in seven talas; surrounded by a multitude of bodhisattvas who are respectful, he comes to Mount Gṛdhrakūṭa in the Saṃbha world.

source_sentence: 到已下七寶臺，以價直百千瓔珞，持至釋迦牟尼佛所，頭面禮足，奉上瓔珞，而白佛言：「世尊！
translation: When they arrived, they descended from the seven-jeweled dais, took a hundred thousand ornaments of value and brought them to Śākyamuni Buddha, bowed their heads and feet, presented the ornaments, and said to him, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 淨華宿王智佛問訊世尊，少病少惱，起居輕利安樂行不？
translation: Would the Venerable Śubhavyūha Buddha, the wise king of the Pure Land, ask if he would practice with few illnesses and few disturbances, and live in comfort and ease?

source_sentence: 四大調和不？
translation: Four major blends and no?

source_sentence: 世事可忍不？
translation: Are the things of the world tolerable?

source_sentence: 眾生易度不？
translation: Are the multitude of beings easy to cross over?

source_sentence: 無多貪欲、瞋恚、愚癡、嫉妬、慳慢不？
translation: Are there not many desires, anger, delusions, jealousies, and stinginess?

source_sentence: 無不孝父母、不敬沙門不？
translation: Is there no father or mother who is unfilial and no ascetic who is dishonored?

source_sentence: 無邪見不？
translation: Is there no mistaken view?

source_sentence: 無不善心不？
translation: Is it without unwholesome intentions?

source_sentence: 攝五情不？
translation: Does it not include the five senses?

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 眾生能降伏諸魔怨不？
translation: Can sentient beings subdue Māra's enemies?

source_sentence: 久滅度多寶如來在七寶塔中來聽法不？
translation: Did the long-extinct Tathāgata Abundant Treasures Tathāgata come to listen to the teaching in one of the seven jeweled stūpas?

source_sentence: 又問訊多寶如來，安隱少惱堪忍久住不？
translation: Again, I'd like to ask the Tathāgata Abundant Treasures Tathāgata, can he abide calmly and with few disturbances for a long time?

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我今欲見多寶佛身，惟願世尊，示我令見。」
translation: Now, I want to see the body of the Prabhūtaratna Buddha, so may the Bhagavān show me how to see it."

source_sentence: 爾時釋迦牟尼佛語多寶佛：「是妙音菩薩欲得相見。」
translation: It was then that Śākyamuni Buddha said to Prabhūtaratna Buddha, "This is the desire of Miaoyin Bodhisattva to see each other."

source_sentence: 時多寶佛告妙音言：「善哉，善哉！
translation: The then Prabhūtaratna Buddha addressed Miaoyin, saying, "Good, good!

source_sentence: 汝能為供養釋迦牟尼佛及聽《法華經》并見文殊師利等故來至此。」
translation: Can you come here because you want to make offerings to Śākyamuni Buddha, listen to the Lotus Sutra, and see Mañjuśrī?"

source_sentence: 爾時華德菩薩白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the Blessed One said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是妙音菩薩種何善根、修何功德，有是神力？」
translation: What good roots and virtues did this wonderful voice bodhisattva cultivate that gave him such supernormal powers?"

source_sentence: 佛告華德菩薩：「過去有佛，名雲雷音王多陀阿伽度、阿羅呵、三藐三佛陀，國名現一切世間，劫名喜見。
translation: The Buddha told Padmaśrī, "In the past, there was a Buddha named Megha-dundubhi-mega-nirghoṣa-samyak-saṃbuddha whose kingdom name appeared in all the world and whose eon name was Pleasant View.

source_sentence: 妙音菩薩於萬二千歲，以十萬種伎樂供養雲雷音王佛，并奉上八萬四千七寶鉢，以是因緣果報，今生淨華宿王智佛所，有是神力。
translation: During 12,000 years, Miaoyin Bodhisattva made offerings of 100,000 kinds of music to Megha-dundubhi-mega-nirghoṣa and presented 84,000 seven-jewel bowls, and because of the results of those causes and conditions, he was now born at the Jñānagupta Constellation King Zhizo Buddha and has this miraculous power.

source_sentence: 華德！
translation: Padmaśrī!

source_sentence: 於汝意云何？
translation: What do you think?

source_sentence: 爾時雲雷音王佛所妙音菩薩伎樂供養奉上寶器者，豈異人乎？
translation: At the time, was that someone else, the wonderful-voice bodhisattva at the residence of the King of Thunderbolt Buddhas who made musical offerings and presented supreme precious vessels?

source_sentence: 今此妙音菩薩摩訶薩是。
translation: "Now, this is the Marvelous Sound Bodhisattva Mahāsattva.

source_sentence: 華德！
translation: Padmaśrī!

source_sentence: 是妙音菩薩，已曾供養親近無量諸佛，久殖德本，又值恒河沙等百千萬億那由他佛。
translation: This is the Marvelous Sound Bodhisattva, who has made offerings to and become intimate with measureless buddhas, has long accumulated a base of virtue, and has attained a hundred thousand million nayutas like the Ganges River Sands.

source_sentence: 華德！
translation: Padmaśrī!

source_sentence: 汝但見妙音菩薩其身在此，而是菩薩現種種身，處處為諸眾生說是經典，或現梵王身、或現帝釋身、或現自在天身、或現大自在天身、或現天大將軍身、或現毘沙門天王身、或現轉輪王身、或現諸小王身、或現長者身、或現居士身、或現宰官身、或現婆羅門身、或現比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷身、或現長者、居士、婦女身、或現宰官婦女身、或現婆羅門婦女身、或現童男童女身、或現天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿脩羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽、人非人等身、而說是經。
translation: 汝但見妙音菩薩其身在此，而是菩薩現種種身，處處為諸眾生說是經典，或現梵王身、或現帝釋身、或現自在天身、或現大自在天身、或現天大將軍身、或現毘沙門天王身、或現轉輪王身、或現諸小王身、或現長者身、或現居士身、或現宰官身、或現婆羅門身、或現比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷身、或現長者、居士、婦女身、或現宰官婦女身、或現婆羅門婦女身、或現童男童女身、或現天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿脩羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽、人非人等身、而說是經。

source_sentence: 諸有地獄、餓鬼、畜生及眾難處皆能救濟，乃至於王後宮變為女身，而說是經。
translation: He's able to rescue all the hells, hungry ghosts, animals, and other difficult places, even transforming into the body of a woman in the king's palace, and then he teaches this sūtra.

source_sentence: 華德！
translation: Padma!

source_sentence: 是妙音菩薩，能救護娑婆世界諸眾生者。
translation: "This is the Marvelous Sound Bodhisattva who can rescue the sentient beings of the Saṃbha world.

source_sentence: 是妙音菩薩，如是種種變化現身，在此娑婆國土，為諸眾生說是經典，於神通變化智慧，無所損減。
translation: This is the Marvelous Sound Bodhisattva who thus manifests himself in various ways and teaches these sūtras to sentient beings in the Saṃbha land, without any loss of supernormal powers, changes, or wisdom.

source_sentence: 是菩薩，以若干智慧明照娑婆世界，令一切眾生各得所知，於十方恒河沙世界中，亦復如是，若應以聲聞形得度者，現聲聞形而為說法；應以辟支佛形得度者，現辟支佛形而為說法；應以菩薩形得度者，現菩薩形而為說法；應以佛形得度者，即現佛形而為說法；如是種種隨所應度者，而為現形。
translation: This bodhisattva, who clearly illuminates the sahā world with certain kinds of wisdom so that all sentient beings can each know it, also does the same in the world of the Ganges River Sands in the ten directions: if he should be saved in the form of a śrāvaka, he shows up in the form of a śrāvaka and preaches; if he should be saved in the form of a pratyekabuddha, he shows up in the form of a pratyekabuddha and preaches; if he should be saved in the form of a bodhisattva, he shows up in the form of a buddha and preaches; and so forth, he shows up in the form of someone who should be saved as he sees fit.

source_sentence: 乃至應以滅度而得度者，示現滅度。
translation: Even those who should be liberated in order to be liberated will manifest their extinction.

source_sentence: 華德！
translation: Padma!

source_sentence: 妙音菩薩摩訶薩，成就大神通智慧之力，其事如是。」
translation: The Marvelous Sound Bodhisattva Mahāsattva has accomplished the power of great supernormal wisdom, and this is how it happened."

source_sentence: 爾時華德菩薩白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the Bodhisattva Flower Power said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是妙音菩薩深種善根。
translation: This is the Marvelous Sound Bodhisattva who has deeply planted good roots.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是菩薩住何三昧，而能如是在所變現度脫眾生？」
translation: What kind of samādhi does the bodhisattva abide in that enables him to thus manifest and liberate sentient beings?"

source_sentence: 佛告華德菩薩：「善男子！
translation: The Buddha addressed the bodhisattva Flower Power, "Good sons!

source_sentence: 其三昧，名現一切色身；妙音菩薩住是三昧中，能如是饒益無量眾生。」
translation: Its samādhi is called 'manifesting the body of all forms;' and Miaoyin Bodhisattva abides in this samādhi and can thus benefit measureless sentient beings."

source_sentence: 說是〈妙音菩薩品〉時，與妙音菩薩俱來者八萬四千人，皆得現一切色身三昧，此娑婆世界無量菩薩，亦得是三昧及陀羅尼。
translation: When this Chapter of the Bodhisattva Miaoyin was taught, 84,000 people who came with Miaoyin obtained the samādhi of manifesting the body of all forms, and measureless bodhisattvas in this sahā world also obtained this samādhi and dhāraṇī.

source_sentence: 爾時妙音菩薩摩訶薩，供養釋迦牟尼佛及多寶佛塔已，還歸本土，所經諸國六種震動雨寶蓮華，作百千萬億種種伎樂。
translation: After making offerings to Śākyamuni Buddha and the many-jeweled stūpa, the Sumeru Bodhisattva returned to his homeland, where he passed through six kinds of vibrating rain of precious lotus flowers and created a hundred thousand million million kinds of music.

source_sentence: 既到本國，與八萬四千菩薩圍遶，至淨華宿王智佛所白佛言：「世尊！
translation: When he arrived in his native land, he was surrounded by 84,000 bodhisattvas and went to the Jñānagupta Constellation King Zhizhao and said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我到娑婆世界饒益眾生，見釋迦牟尼佛及見多寶佛塔，禮拜供養；又見文殊師利法王子，及見藥王菩薩、得勤精進力菩薩、勇施菩薩等，亦令是八萬四千菩薩得現一切色身三昧。」
translation: When I went to the Śākyamuni world to benefit sentient beings, I saw Śākyamuni Buddha, saw many jeweled stūpas, venerated and made offerings to them, saw Mañjuśrī, the Dharma prince, saw Medicine King Bodhisattva, attained the bodhisattva of diligence and vigor, and so forth, and caused 84,000 of these bodhisattvas to attain the samādhi of manifesting all forms of body."

source_sentence: 說是〈妙音菩薩來往品〉時，四萬二千天子得無生法忍，華德菩薩得法華三昧。

source_sentence: ◎◎添品妙法蓮華經觀世音菩薩普門品第二十四爾時無盡意菩薩，即從座起，偏袒右肩，合掌向佛，而作是言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the Bodhisattva of Inexhaustible Wisdom rose from his seat, bared his right shoulder, put his palms together, and addressed the Buddha, saying, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 觀世音菩薩，以何因緣名觀世音？」
translation: Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva, by what causes and conditions is he called Avalokitêśvara?"

source_sentence: 佛告無盡意菩薩：「善男子！
translation: The Buddha addressed the bodhisattva Akṣayamati, "Good sons!

source_sentence: 若有無量百千萬億眾生，受諸苦惱，聞是觀世音菩薩，一心稱名觀世音菩薩，即時觀其音聲皆得解脫。
translation: "If there are measureless hundreds of thousands of millions of sentient beings who are suffering and afflicted, and they hear this Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva and whole-heartedly call on the name Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva, then they'll instantly observe his voice and be liberated.

source_sentence: 「若有持是觀世音菩薩名者，設入大火火不能燒，由是菩薩威神力故。
translation: "If someone were to hold this Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva's name, suppose they were to enter a great fire that couldn't burn them because of the bodhisattva's authority and power.

source_sentence: 「若為大水所漂，稱其名號即得淺處。
translation: "If he were to be caught adrift in a great river, he'd call on his name and find a shallow place.

source_sentence: 「若有百千萬億眾生，為求金、銀、琉璃、車璩、馬瑙、珊瑚、琥珀、真珠等寶，入於大海，假使黑風吹其船舫，飄墮羅剎鬼國，其中若有乃至一人稱觀世音菩薩名者，是諸人等皆得解脫羅剎之難，以是因緣名觀世音。
translation: "If a hundred thousand million million sentient beings seeking gold, silver, lapis lazuli, carabiners, coral, amber, real pearls, or other treasures enter the ocean, and suppose a black wind blows their boats and they're swept away into the kingdom of Rājas and ghosts, then if even one of them calls on the name of Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva, those people will be freed from the difficulty of Rājas, and for that reason they'll be called Avalokitêśvara.

source_sentence: 「若復有人臨當被害，稱觀世音菩薩名者，彼所執刀杖，尋段段壞而得解脫。
translation: "If another person is about to be harmed and they call Avalokitêśvara by name, the knife or stick they're holding will break in pieces and they'll be liberated.

source_sentence: 「若三千大千國土滿中夜叉羅剎，欲來惱人，聞其稱觀世音菩薩名者，是諸惡鬼尚不能以惡眼視之，況復加害。
translation: "If there are 3,000 great thousand lands full of nightjars and rājas that want to come and harm people, and they hear them calling Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva by name, how could those evil spirits look at them with evil eyes and harm them?

source_sentence: 「設復有人，若有罪、若無罪，杻械枷鎖撿繫其身，稱觀世音菩薩名者，皆悉斷壞即得解脫。
translation: "Suppose there's a person who's guilty or not guilty and is bound with a handcuff or shackle and calls on the name of Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva, they'll all be destroyed and freed.

source_sentence: 「若三千大千國土滿中怨賊，有一商主將諸商人，齎持重寶經過險路，其中一人作是唱言：『諸善男子勿得恐怖，汝等應當一心稱觀世音菩薩名號，是菩薩能以無畏施於眾生，汝等若稱名者，於此怨賊當得解脫。』
translation: "Suppose there's a merchant who brings a group of merchants carrying valuable treasures through a dangerous path, and one of them calls out, 'Good sons, don't be afraid; you must all wholeheartedly call on the name of Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva, who is able to bestow fearlessness on sentient beings; if you call him by that name, you'll be freed from these enemies and thieves.'

source_sentence: 眾商人聞俱發聲言：『南無觀世音菩薩！』
translation: The merchants who heard this all uttered, 'Homage to the Bodhisattva Avalokitêśvara!'

source_sentence: 稱其名故即得解脫。
translation: By calling it by its name, they'll attain liberation.

source_sentence: 「無盡意！
translation: "Inexhaustible!

source_sentence: 觀世音菩薩摩訶薩，威神之力巍巍如是。
translation: Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva Mahāsattva's authoritative power is as lofty as this.

source_sentence: 「若有眾生，多於婬欲，常念恭敬觀世音菩薩，便得離欲。
translation: "If sentient beings are prone to lust and desire, they can part with desire when they always remember and revere Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 若多瞋恚，常念恭敬觀世音菩薩，便得離瞋。
translation: If they have a lot of anger, they'll always be mindful and respectful of Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva, and then they'll be free of anger.

source_sentence: 若多愚癡，常念恭敬觀世音菩薩，便得離癡。
translation: If they are often foolish, they'll always be mindful and respectful of Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva, and then they'll be free of delusion.

source_sentence: 無盡意！
translation: Inexhaustible thought!

source_sentence: 觀世音菩薩，有如是等大威神力，多所饒益，是故眾生常應心念。
translation: Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva has such great authority and supernormal powers that are often beneficial, so sentient beings should always keep this in mind.

source_sentence: 「若有女人，設欲求男，禮拜恭敬觀世音菩薩，便生福德智慧之男；設欲求女，便生端正有相之女，宿殖德本眾人愛敬。
translation: "If a woman desires a man, then she'll venerate and respect the Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva, and a man of virtue and wisdom will be born, and if she desires a woman, then a woman of decent features will be born, whose past virtues are well-established and loved by many people.

source_sentence: 「無盡意！
translation: "There's no end to it!

source_sentence: 觀世音菩薩有如是力，若有眾生，恭敬禮拜觀世音菩薩，福不唐捐；是故眾生，皆應受持觀世音菩薩名號。
translation: Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva has such power that if sentient beings respectfully venerate Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva, their merits won't be spared; therefore, all sentient beings should accept and uphold the name of Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 「無盡意！
translation: "Inexhaustible!

source_sentence: 若有人受持六十二億恒河沙菩薩名字，復盡形供養飲食、衣服、臥具、醫藥，於汝意云何？
translation: If someone were to accept the name of the 6,200,000,000,000 Gaṅgāsas bodhisattva and also make all physical offerings of food, drink, clothing, bedding, and medicine, what do you think?

source_sentence: 是善男子善女人，功德多不？」
translation: Does this good man and good woman have much merit?"

source_sentence: 無盡意言：「甚多！
translation: Inexhaustible says, "Very much!

source_sentence: 世尊！」
translation: Bhagavān!"

source_sentence: 佛言：「若復有人，受持觀世音菩薩名號，乃至一時禮拜供養，是二人福正等無異，於百千萬億劫不可窮盡。
translation: The Buddha said, "If another person accepts the name of Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva and venerates and makes offerings to him even at one time, those two people's merits will be precisely the same and will not be exhausted for a hundred thousand million billion eons.

source_sentence: 無盡意！
translation: Inexhaustible!

source_sentence: 受持觀世音菩薩名號，得如是無量無邊福德之利。」
translation: By upholding the name of Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva, you'll attain such immeasurable and limitless benefits of merit."

source_sentence: 無盡意菩薩白佛言：「世尊！
translation: The Bodhisattva of Inexhaustible Wisdom said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 觀世音菩薩，云何遊此娑婆世界？
translation: Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva, how does he travel to this sahā world?

source_sentence: 云何而為眾生說法？
translation: How do you teach the Dharma for sentient beings?

source_sentence: 方便之力其事云何？」
translation: What does the power of skillful means do?"

source_sentence: 佛告無盡意菩薩：「善男子！
translation: The Buddha addressed the bodhisattva Akṣayamati, "Good sons!

source_sentence: 若有國土眾生應以佛身得度者，觀世音菩薩，即現佛身而為說法。
translation: "If there are sentient beings in a land who should be saved in the Buddha's body, the Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva will manifest the Buddha's body and preach the Dharma.

source_sentence: 應以辟支佛身得度者，即現辟支佛身而為說法。
translation: Those who should be liberated in the body of a pratyekabuddha, then he'll present himself in the body of a pratyekabuddha and preach.

source_sentence: 應以聲聞身得度者，即現聲聞身而為說法。
translation: He who should be liberated in the body of a śrāvaka, that is, he presents himself in the body of a śrāvaka and preaches.

source_sentence: 應以梵王身得度者，即現梵王身而為說法。
translation: He who should be liberated in the body of a Brahma king, then he will present the body of a Brahma king and preach the Dharma.

source_sentence: 應以帝釋身得度者，即現帝釋身而為說法。
translation: He who should be liberated in the body of Indra, then he will present the body of Indra and preach the Dharma.

source_sentence: 應以自在天身得度者，即現自在天身而為說法。
translation: He who should be liberated in the body of the Mahêśvara gods, then he'll present the body of the Mahêśvara gods and preach the Dharma.

source_sentence: 應以大自在天身得度者，即現大自在天身而為說法。
translation: He who should be liberated in the body of the Mahêśvara gods, then he'll present the body of the Mahêśvara gods and preach the Dharma.

source_sentence: 應以天大將軍身得度者，即現天大將軍身而為說法。
translation: He who should be liberated in the body of the Mahādeva General of Heaven, then he will present the body of the Mahādeva General of Heaven and preach the Dharma.

source_sentence: 應以毘沙門身得度者，即現毘沙門身而為說法。
translation: He who should be liberated in the body of a Vaiśravaṇa, then he'll present himself as a Vaiśravaṇa and expound the Dharma.

source_sentence: 應以小王身得度者，即現小王身而為說法。
translation: Those who should be liberated in the body of a lesser king will present the body of a lesser king and deliver the teaching.

source_sentence: 應以長者身得度者，即現長者身而為說法。
translation: He who should be liberated in the body of an elder, then he will present himself as an elder and preach the Dharma.

source_sentence: 應以居士身得度者，即現居士身而為說法。
translation: He who should be liberated in the body of a householder, then he will present himself as a householder and preach the Dharma.

source_sentence: 應以宰官身得度者，即現宰官身而為說法。
translation: He who should be liberated in the body of a ruler, then he will present himself as a ruler and deliver the teaching.

source_sentence: 應以婆羅門身得度者，即現婆羅門身而為說法。
translation: Those who should be liberated in the body of a brāhmaṇa should present themselves as a brāhmaṇa and preach the Dharma.

source_sentence: 應以比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷身得度者，即現比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷身而為說法。
translation: He who should be saved in the body of a monk, bhikṣuṇī, upāsaka, or upāsik, that's the monk, bhikṣuṇī, upāsaka, or upāsik who will preach in his or her own body.

source_sentence: 應以長者、居士、宰官、婆羅門、婦女身得度者，即現婦女身而為說法。
translation: Those who have been saved in the body of an elder, householder, ruler, brāhmaṇa, or woman should present themselves as women and deliver the teaching.

source_sentence: 應以童男、童女身得度者，即現童男、童女身而為說法。
translation: Those who should be saved in the body of a boy or girl should present themselves as boys and girls and deliver the teaching.

source_sentence: 應以天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿修羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽、人非人等身得度者，即皆現之而為說法。
translation: Those who should be liberated in the bodies of gods, dragons, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, humans, and nonhumans should all be manifested in their bodies and have the teaching given.

source_sentence: 應以執金剛神得度者，即現執金剛神而為說法。
translation: Those who have attained salvation by possessing the vajra spirit will then be manifested as possessing the vajra spirit and will preach.

source_sentence: 「無盡意！
translation: "There's no end to it!

source_sentence: 觀世音菩薩，成就如是功德，以種種形遊諸國土，度脫眾生；是故汝等，應當一心供養觀世音菩薩。
translation: Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva has accomplished such virtue and travels around the lands in various forms to liberate sentient beings; therefore, you people should wholeheartedly make offerings to Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 是觀世音菩薩摩訶薩，於怖畏急難之中，能施無畏，是故此娑婆世界，皆號之為施無畏者。」
translation: This Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva and Mahāsattva is able to bestow fearlessness in the midst of fear and difficulty, and so everyone in the sahā world is called "one who bestows fearlessness."

source_sentence: 無盡意菩薩白佛言：「世尊！
translation: The Bodhisattva of Inexhaustible Wisdom said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我今當供養觀世音菩薩。」
translation: Now, I will make offerings to Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva."

source_sentence: 即解頸眾寶珠瓔珞價直百千兩金，而以與之，作是言：「仁者！
translation: He then untied his neck and gave it to them with a necklace full of precious jewels and beads costing a hundred thousand taels of gold, saying, "Sir!

source_sentence: 受此法施珍寶瓔珞。」
translation: Accept this offering of a precious jeweled necklace."

source_sentence: 時觀世音菩薩不肯受之。
translation: Avalokitêśvara then refused to accept it.

source_sentence: 無盡意復白觀世音菩薩言：「仁者！
translation: Amitâbha then said to Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva, "Sir!

source_sentence: 愍我等故受此瓔珞。」
translation: Accept this necklace because of pity for us."

source_sentence: 爾時佛告觀世音菩薩：「當愍此無盡意菩薩及四眾、天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿修羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽、人非人等故、受是瓔珞。」
translation: It was then that the Buddha addressed Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva, "Please take pity on this inexhaustible-minded bodhisattva and the four congregations, gods, dragons, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, humans and non-humans, and so forth, and accept this necklace."

source_sentence: 即時觀世音菩薩，愍諸四眾及於天、龍、人非人等故，受其瓔珞，分作二分，一分奉釋迦牟尼佛，一分奉多寶佛塔。
translation: At that moment, the Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva, pitying the four crowds, gods, dragons, humans and non-humans alike, accepted this necklace in two parts, one for Śakyamuni Buddha and one for the pagoda of Prabhūtaratna.

source_sentence: 「無盡意！
translation: "Inexhaustible!

source_sentence: 觀世音菩薩，有如是自在神力，遊於娑婆世界。」
translation: Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva has this kind of unimpeded spiritual power as he travels through the sahā world."

source_sentence: 爾時莊嚴幢菩薩問無盡意菩薩言：「佛子！
translation: It was then that the Bodhisattva Vairocana asked the Bodhisattva of Inexhaustible Wisdom, "Son of the Buddha!

source_sentence: 以何因緣名觀世音？」
translation: By what causes and conditions is Avalokitêśvara called?"

source_sentence: 無盡意菩薩即便遍觀觀世音菩薩過去願海，告莊嚴幢菩薩言：「佛子！
translation: Even as he was contemplating the ocean of the bodhisattva Avalokitêśvara's past vows, the Buddha of inexhaustible aspiration addressed the Bodhisattva Vairocana, saying, "Son of the Buddha!

source_sentence: 諦聽觀世音菩薩所行之行。」
translation: Listen closely to the practice of the Bodhisattva Avalokitêśvara."

source_sentence: 爾時無盡意菩薩即說偈言：「世尊妙相具，　　我今重問彼；　佛子何因緣，　　名為觀世音？
translation: At that point, the Bodhisattva of inexhaustible mind spoke a verse, "The Bhagavān has marvelous features, and now I'm asking him again, 'What is the reason the Buddha's son is called Avalokitêśvara?'

source_sentence: 具足妙相尊，　　偈答無盡意。
translation: "Venerable Prabhūtaratna, we reply in verse with inexhaustible meaning.

source_sentence: 汝聽觀音行，　　善應諸方所，　弘誓深如海，　　歷劫不思議，　侍多千億佛，　　發大清淨願。
translation: "You've heard Avalokitêśvara's practice, which responds well to all directions, has a profound vow as deep as the ocean, passes through eons without thought, serves a hundred billion buddhas, and makes a great pure vow.

source_sentence: 我為汝略說，　　聞名及見身，　心念不空過，　　能滅諸有苦。
translation: I'll explain it briefly for you, hearing the name and seeing the body, mindful and not in vain, will end the suffering of all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 假使興害意，　　推落大火坑；　念彼觀音力，　　火坑變成池。
translation: Suppose you were to have harmful thoughts and push them down into a great fiery pit, then remembering the power of Avalokitêśvara, the fiery pit becomes a pond.

source_sentence: 或漂流巨海，　　魚龍諸鬼難；　念彼觀音力，　　波浪不能沒。
translation: Suppose he drifts into a huge ocean and is confronted by fish, dragons, and ghosts; mindful of his Avalokitêśvara's power, the waves can't sink him.

source_sentence: 或在須彌峯，　　為人所推墮；　念彼觀音力，　　如日虛空住。
translation: Sometimes they're on Sumeru Peak and are pushed down by someone; mindful of his Avalokitêśvara power, they stand like the sun in space.

source_sentence: 或被惡人逐，　　墮落金剛山；　念彼觀音力，　　不能損一毛。
translation: Sometimes they're chased by evil people and fall down Vajra Mountain; mindful of their Avalokitêśvara power, they can't lose a hair.

source_sentence: 或值怨賊繞，　　各執刀加害；　念彼觀音力，　　咸即起慈心。
translation: Sometimes they're surrounded by enemies and thieves, each holding a sword and inflicting harm; mindful of their Avalokitêśvara power, they all immediately become compassionate.

source_sentence: 或遭王難苦，　　臨刑欲壽終；　念彼觀音力，　　刀尋段段壞。
translation: Sometimes a king suffers hardship and is about to die; mindful of Avalokitêśvara's power, the sword finds its way into pieces and destroys them.

source_sentence: 或囚禁枷鎖，　　手足被杻械；　念彼觀音力，　　釋然得解脫。
translation: They may be imprisoned and chained, or their hands and feet may be handcuffed; mindful of the power of Avalokitêśvara, they are freed completely.

source_sentence: 呪咀諸毒藥，　　所欲害身者；　念彼觀音力，　　彼即轉迴去。
translation: A spell is passed over poisonous substances that want to harm them; remember the power of Avalokitêśvara, and they'll turn around and leave.

source_sentence: 或遇惡羅剎，　　毒龍諸鬼等；　念彼觀音力，　　時悉不敢害。
translation: If they encounter a bad rāṣa, a poisonous dragon, or a ghost, they won't dare to harm them if they remember the power of Avalokitêśvara.

source_sentence: 若惡獸圍遶，　　利牙爪可怖；　念彼觀音力，　　疾走無邊方。
translation: If they're surrounded by dangerous animals with sharp teeth and fearful claws, mindful of their Avalokitêśvara power, they quickly run off in measureless directions.

source_sentence: 蚖蛇及蝮蠍，　　氣毒烟火燃；　念彼觀音力，　　尋聲自迴去。
translation: Snakes and vipers have poisonous breath, and smoke and fire ignite; mindful of his Avalokitêśvara power, they turn away on their own when they hear his voice.

source_sentence: 雲雷鼓掣電，　　降雹澍大雨；　念彼觀音力，　　應時得消散。
translation: A thundercloud drums a flash of lightning, and hailstones rain down a deluge; mindful of his Avalokitêśvara power, they'll dissipate on cue.

source_sentence: 眾生被困厄，　　無量苦逼身；　觀音妙智力，　　能救世間苦。
translation: Sentient beings are beset by trouble and limitless suffering, and Avalokitêśvara's marvelous power of discernment can save them from worldly suffering.

source_sentence: 具足神通力，　　廣修智方便，　十方諸國土，　　無剎不現身。
translation: Possessing supernormal powers and extensively cultivating the arts of wisdom, there are no lands in the ten directions where Avalokitêśvara doesn't manifest himself.

source_sentence: 種種諸惡趣，　　地獄鬼畜生；　生老病死苦，　　以漸悉令滅。
translation: The various evil destinies, hell, ghosts, and animals, and the suffering of birth, old age, illness, and death are gradually all made to cease.

source_sentence: 真觀清淨觀，　　廣大智慧觀；　悲觀及慈觀，　　常願常瞻仰。
translation: He observes the purity of true contemplation, the breadth of wisdom, and the contemplation of pity and kindness, always venerating them with the hope that they will always be venerated.

source_sentence: 無垢清淨光，　　慧日破諸闇；　能伏災風火，　　普明照世間。
translation: A pure, unblemished light, a sun of wisdom that refutes darkness, quells calamity, winds, and fires, and illuminates the world universally.

source_sentence: 悲體戒雷震，　　慈意妙大雲；　澍甘露法雨，　　滅除煩惱焰。
translation: The essence of compassion and morality thunder, and the mind of kindness is a great, marvelous cloud that rains down sweet dharma and extinguishes the flames of affliction.

source_sentence: 諍訟經官處，　　怖畏軍陣中；　念彼觀音力，　　眾怨悉退散。
translation: When disputes arise in the midst of officials and fears in the midst of armies, mindful of Avalokitêśvara's power, all enemies are dispersed.

source_sentence: 妙音觀世音，　　梵音海潮音，　勝彼世間音，　　是故須常念。
translation: Avalokitêśvara, the marvelous sound, and the Brahma sound of the ocean tide are superior to their worldly sounds; therefore, they must always be mindful.

source_sentence: 念念勿生疑，　　觀世音淨聖；　於苦惱死厄，　　能為作依怙。
translation: Never doubting it, Avalokitêśvara is pure and noble, and it can serve as a refuge from suffering, distress, death, and adversity.

source_sentence: 具一切功德，　　慈眼視眾生；　福聚海無量，　　是故應頂禮。」
translation: Endowed with all merits, he looks at sentient beings with kind eyes; the ocean of merit is measureless; therefore, he should pay homage to them."

source_sentence: 爾時持地菩薩即從座起，前白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the Earth-holding Bodhisattva rose from his seat and went up to the Buddha, saying, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若有眾生，聞是〈觀世音菩薩品〉自在之業普門示現神通力者，當知是人功德不少。」
translation: If there are sentient beings who hear this Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva Chapter's unimpeded actions and universal manifestation of supernormal powers, they should know that this person has quite a bit of merit."

source_sentence: 佛說是〈普門品〉時，眾中八萬四千眾生，皆發無等等阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
translation: When the Buddha spoke this Samanta-mukha-parivar, 84,000 sentient beings among them all aroused the unsurpassed mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 添品妙法蓮華經妙莊嚴王本事品
translation: Appended Chapter of the Sutra of the Lotus of the Wonderful Dharma: The Skillful Exposition of the King of Adornment

source_sentence: 第二十五
translation: twenty-five

source_sentence: 爾時佛告諸大眾：「乃往古世，過無量無邊不可思議阿僧祇劫，有佛，名雲雷音宿王華智多陀阿伽度、阿羅訶、三藐三佛陀，國名光明莊嚴，劫名喜見。
translation: It was then that the Buddha addressed the crowd, "In an ancient time, long ago, beyond measureless and unfathomable incalculable eons, there was a Buddha named Meghasvaradhvaja, Araha, Samyak-saṃbuddha, whose kingdom was called Radiant Adornment and whose eon was called Joyful Vision.

source_sentence: 彼佛法中有王，名妙莊嚴，其王夫人，名曰淨德，有二子：一名淨藏，二名淨眼。
translation: There's a king in that Buddha's Dharma named Marvelous Adornment, whose wife is named Jingde and has two sons, one named Jingzang and the other named Jingye.

source_sentence: 是二子，有大神力福德智慧，久修菩薩所行之道，所謂檀波羅蜜、尸羅波羅蜜、羼提波羅蜜、毘梨耶波羅蜜、禪波羅蜜、般若波羅蜜、方便波羅蜜，慈、悲、喜、捨，乃至三十七助道法，皆悉明了通達。
translation: These two sons have great spiritual power, fortune, and wisdom, and have long cultivated the path practiced by the bodhisattvas, which is called the perfection of giving, the perfection of śīla, the perfection of kṣatriya, the perfection of vīrya, the perfection of meditation, the perfection of wisdom, the perfection of skillful means, and the 37 auxiliary paths of kindness, pity, joy, and equanimity, which are all fully understood and comprehended.

source_sentence: 又得菩薩淨三昧、日星宿三昧、淨光三昧、淨色三昧、淨照明三昧、長莊嚴三昧、大威德藏三昧，於此三昧亦悉通達。
translation: They've also attained the bodhisattva's pure concentration, sun and star constellation concentration, pure light concentration, pure form concentration, pure illumination concentration, long adornment concentration, and great authoritative store concentration, and they've fully comprehended these samādhis.

source_sentence: 「爾時彼佛欲引導妙莊嚴王，及愍念眾生故，說是《法華經》。
translation: "At the time, that Buddha wanted to guide King Miaozhuangyan and had compassion for sentient beings, so he taught this version of the Lotus Sutra.

source_sentence: 「時淨藏淨眼二子，到其母所，合十指爪掌，白言：『願母往詣雲雷音宿王華智佛所，我等亦當侍從親覲供養禮拜。
translation: "The two sons of Jingzang and Jingan went to their mother, put their palms together with their ten fingers and fingertips, and said, 'May our mother go to the Flower Wisdom Buddha, the Sukhāvatī king of Thunderclaps, and we will also attend, make our prostrations, and venerate him.'

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 此佛於一切天人眾中，說《法華經》，宜應聽受。』
translation: Among all the gods and humans, this Buddha teaches the Lotus Sutra, so it's appropriate to listen and accept it.'

source_sentence: 「母告子言：『汝父信受外道，深著婆羅門法，汝等應往白父，與共俱去。』
translation: "The mother told her son, 'Your father is a believer in the teachings of non-Buddhists and is deeply attached to the teachings of Brahmans; you should go to your father and tell him that you're leaving with him.'

source_sentence: 「淨藏、淨眼合十指爪掌，白母：『我等是法王子，而生此邪見家。』
translation: "Jingzang and Jingye joined their palms with their ten fingers and hands and said to their mother, 'We are princes of the Dharma and have been born into this family of mistaken views.'

source_sentence: 「母告子言：『汝等當憂念汝父為現神變，若得見者心必清淨，或聽我等往至佛所。』
translation: "Mother told her sons, 'You must be concerned that your father is a miracle worker, and that if you could see him, your minds would be purified, or he might listen to us as we go to the Buddha.'

source_sentence: 「於是二子，念其父故，踊在虛空高七多羅樹，現種種神變，於虛空中行、住、坐、臥，身上出水身下出火，身下出水身上出火；或現大身滿虛空中，而復現小，小復現大；於空中滅，忽然在地；入地如水履水如地，現如是等種種神變，令其父王心淨信解。
translation: "Because they were mindful of their father, these two sons rose up seven tāla trees high in the sky and performed various miraculous powers, walking, standing, sitting, and lying down in space, with water coming out of their bodies and fire coming out of their bottoms; they might show a large body filling the sky, then show a small body and a small body showing a large body; they might cease to exist in the sky and suddenly be on the ground; they might enter the ground like water and walk on water like the ground; and they might perform these kinds of miraculous powers to purify their father's mind and convince him to go to the Buddha.

source_sentence: 「時父見子神力如是，心大歡喜得未曾有，合掌向子言：『汝等師為是誰？
translation: "Seeing his son's powers like this, the father was greatly elated and rejoiced like never before, and he joined his palms together and said to his son, 'Who are your teachers?'

source_sentence: 誰之弟子？』
translation: Whose disciple is it?'

source_sentence: 「二子白言：『大王！
translation: "The two sons said, 'Great king!

source_sentence: 彼雲雷音宿王華智佛，今在七寶菩提樹下法座上坐，於一切世間天人眾中，廣說《法華經》，是我等師，我是弟子。』
translation: That cloud of thunderous sounds, the Constellation King Flower Wisdom Buddha, is sitting on his Dharma throne under the seven-jewel bodhi tree, expounding the Lotus Sutra among all the world's gods and humans, and he's our teacher and I'm his disciple.'

source_sentence: 「父語子言：『我今亦欲見汝等師，可共俱往。』
translation: "The father said to the son, 'Now, I also want to meet your teacher, so we can go together.'

source_sentence: 「於是二子從空中下，到其母所，合掌白母：『父王今已信解，堪任發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，我等為父已作佛事，願母見聽於彼佛所出家修道。』
translation: "Then the two sons descended from the sky to their mother, put their palms together, and said to her, 'Now that the father has believed and understood that he's capable of generating the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment, we've done Buddha-work for our father, so may our mother see and hear him leave home and train at that Buddha's place.'

source_sentence: 爾時二子，欲重宣其意，以偈白母：「『願母放我等，　　出家作沙門；　　諸佛甚難值，　　我等隨佛學。
translation: It was then that the two sons wanted to reiterate their intention and said to their mother in verse, "May our mother release us to leave home and become ascetics; it's so difficult to meet the buddhas, and we'll follow them in their training.

source_sentence: 如優曇波羅，　　值佛復難是；　　脫諸難亦難，　　願聽我出家。』
translation: Just like Udumbara, it's difficult to meet the Buddha; it's also difficult to be freed from all the difficulties, so please let me leave home.'

source_sentence: 「母即告言：『聽汝出家。
translation: "Mother then told him, 'I'll allow you to leave home.'

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 佛難值故。』
translation: It's difficult to meet the Buddha.'

source_sentence: 「於是二子白父母言：『善哉父母！
translation: "The two sons then said to their parents, 'Good, parents!

source_sentence: 願時往詣雲雷音宿王華智佛所親覲供養。
translation: "May I go to the Flower Wisdom Buddha, the king of the thundering constellations, at that time to pay my respects and make offerings to him.

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 佛難得值，如優曇波羅華；又如一眼之龜值浮木孔，而我等宿福深厚生值佛法。
translation: It's difficult to attain Buddhahood, like the udumbara flower, or like a one-eyed tortoise finding a hole in a floating log, but we were born with profound past fortune and found ourselves in the Buddha's Dharma.

source_sentence: 是故父母，當聽我等令得出家。
translation: Therefore, parents, you must listen to us and allow us to leave home.

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 諸佛難值時亦難遇。』
translation: It's also difficult to meet buddhas when they're difficult to meet.'

source_sentence: 「彼時妙莊嚴王，後宮八萬四千人，悉皆堪任受持是《法華經》。
translation: "At the time, the 84,000 people in the rear palace of the king of marvelous adornment were all capable of accepting and upholding this Sutra of the Dharma Flower.

source_sentence: 淨眼菩薩，於法華三昧久已通達。
translation: The Jing-eye Bodhisattva had long comprehended the Lotus Absorption Samādhi.

source_sentence: 淨藏菩薩，已於無量百千萬億劫通達離諸惡趣三昧，欲令一切眾生離諸惡趣故。
translation: The Jingzang Bodhisattva, who had mastered the concentration of freedom from evil destinies for measureless hundreds of thousands of millions of eons, wanted to cause all sentient beings to part with the evil destinies.

source_sentence: 其王夫人，得諸佛集三昧，能知諸佛祕密之藏，二子如是以方便力善化其父，令心信解好樂佛法。
translation: The king's wife has attained the concentration of the Buddha's collection and can know the hidden treasures of the buddhas, and these two sons thus skillfully teach their father with the power of skillful means, making their hearts believe and understand the Buddha's teachings and delight in them.

source_sentence: 「於是妙莊嚴王，與群臣眷屬俱，淨德夫人與後宮婇女眷屬俱，其王二子與四萬二千人俱，一時共詣佛所，到已頭面禮足，繞佛三匝却住一面。
translation: "Then, the king of marvelous adornment, together with his retinue of ministers, the lady of pure virtue, her retinue of women in the rear palace, and the king's two sons, together with 42,000 people, all went to the Buddha at once, paid homage with their heads and feet, circled him three times, and withdrew to one side.

source_sentence: 爾時彼佛，為王說法示教利喜，王大歡悅。
translation: The Buddha then taught the king the Dharma and showed him how to benefit and delight the king, and the king was greatly pleased.

source_sentence: 爾時妙莊嚴王及其夫人，解頸真珠瓔珞價直百千，以散佛上，於虛空中化成四柱寶臺，臺中有大寶床，敷百千萬天衣，其上有佛結跏趺坐，放大光明。
translation: At the time, King Miaozhuangyan and his wife untied their necks and necklaces and scattered a hundred thousand beads and jewelry, which were worth a hundred thousand pieces, on top of the Buddha and were transformed into a four-pillar jeweled platform in the sky, with a large jeweled bed covered with a hundred million pieces of heavenly robes and a Buddha sitting cross-legged on top of it, magnifying his light.

source_sentence: 「爾時妙莊嚴王作是念：『佛身希有端嚴殊特，成就第一微妙之色。』
translation: "At the time, the king of marvelous adornment thought, 'The Buddha's body is rare and endowed with extraordinary splendor, and it's the accomplishment of the most subtle form.'

source_sentence: 「時雲雷音宿王華智佛告四眾言：『汝等見是妙莊嚴王於我前合掌立不？
translation: "The Buddha of Flower Knowledge, the constellation king of the Thunderbolts, then addressed the four groups of people, saying, 'Do you see this wonderfully adorned king standing with his palms together in front of me?'

source_sentence: 此王於我法中作比丘，精勤修習助佛道法，當得作佛，號娑羅樹王，國名大光，劫名大高王。
translation: This king, who became a monk in my order and diligently cultivated the principles that aid the Buddha's path, will become a buddha and be called Sālêndra-rāja, whose kingdom is called Mahāprabhāsa, and whose eon is called Mahākauja.

source_sentence: 其娑羅樹王佛，有無量菩薩眾及無量聲聞，其國平正，功德如是。』
translation: That Śāla Tree King Buddha has an innumerable assembly of bodhisattvas and measureless śrāvakas, and his kingdom is peaceful and correct, with qualities like these.'

source_sentence: 其王即時以國付弟，與夫人二子并諸眷屬，於佛法中出家修道。
translation: The king then entrusted his disciples with the kingdom, his wife, two sons, and their retinues, and left home to train in the Buddha's teachings.

source_sentence: 「王出家已，於八萬四千歲常勤精進，修行《妙法華經》，過是已後，得一切淨功德莊嚴三昧。
translation: "After leaving home, the king cultivated the Saddharmapuṇḍarīka-sūtra with constant diligence and effort for 84,000 years, and after that, he attained the sublime concentration of all pure attributes.

source_sentence: 即昇虛空高七多羅樹，而白佛言：『世尊！
translation: He then rose seven tāla trees high in the sky and said to the Buddha, 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 此我二子已作佛事，以神通變化轉我邪心，令得安住於佛法中得見世尊。
translation: These two sons of mine have done Buddha-works and used miraculous powers and transformations to change my wrong mind and make it possible for me to stay in the Buddha's teaching and see the Bhagavān.

source_sentence: 此二子者是我善知識，為欲發起宿世善根饒益我故，來生我家。』
translation: These two sons are my good friends who came to my house because they wanted to give rise to the good roots of past lives for my benefit.'

source_sentence: 「爾時雲雷音宿王華智佛告妙莊嚴王言：『如是，如是！
translation: "It was then that the Buddha of Wisdom, the Constellation King of Thunderclaps, addressed the Vairocana King, saying, 'So it is!

source_sentence: 如汝所言。
translation: As you say.

source_sentence: 若善男子、善女人，種善根故，世世得善知識，其善知識，能作佛事示教利喜，令入阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: 'If good men and good women plant good roots, they'll attain good friends from generation to generation, and those good friends will be able to perform Buddha-works, show and teach them, and bring them to unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.'

source_sentence: 大王當知！
translation: You should know this, Your Majesty!

source_sentence: 善知識者是大因緣，所謂化導令得見佛，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
translation: "A good teacher is a great cause and condition who guides, causes, and leads to a vision of the Buddha, and generates the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 大王！
translation: Great king!

source_sentence: 汝見此二子不？
translation: Do you see these two sons?

source_sentence: 此二子已曾供養六十五百千萬億那由他恒河沙諸佛親見恭敬，於諸佛所受持《法華經》，愍念邪見眾生，令住正見。』
translation: 此二子已曾供養六十五百千萬億那由他恒河沙諸佛親見恭敬，於諸佛所受持《法華經》，愍念邪見眾生，令住正見。』

source_sentence: 「妙莊嚴王，即從虛空中下，而白佛言：『世尊！
translation: "The king of marvelous adornment then descended from the sky and said to the Buddha, 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 如來甚希有，以功德智慧故，頂上肉髻光明顯照，其眼長廣而紺青色，眉間毫相白如珂月，齒白齊密常有光明，脣色赤好如頻婆果。』
translation: The Tathāgata is quite rare; because of his merits and wisdom, his topknot shines brightly, his eyes are long and broad and vaguely blue, the tuft of hair between his eyebrows is as white as the moon, his teeth are white and closely spaced and always shining, and his lips are red and beautiful like the fruit of Bimbisāra.'

source_sentence: 爾時妙莊嚴王，讚歎佛如是等無量百千萬億功德已，於如來前，一心合掌復白佛言：『世尊！
translation: After praising the Buddha for these measureless hundreds of thousands of millions of merits, the king of marvelous adornment then joined his palms with one heart and said to the Buddha, 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 未曾有也，如來之法具足成就，不可思議微妙功德，教戒所行安隱快善。
translation: 'Never has there been a Tathāgata whose teaching is fully accomplished, whose unfathomable and subtle qualities are taught and whose precepts are practiced in a peaceful and pleasant way.

source_sentence: 我從今日，不復自隨心行，不生邪見、憍慢、瞋恚諸惡之心。』
translation: From now on, I won't again act on my own, nor will I give rise to the bad thoughts of wrong view, pride, and anger.'

source_sentence: 說是語已禮佛而出。」
translation: After speaking these words, he paid homage to the Buddha and departed."

source_sentence: 佛告大眾：「於意云何？
translation: The Buddha addressed the crowd, "What do you think?

source_sentence: 妙莊嚴王，豈異人乎？
translation: Is the king of sublime adornment someone else?

source_sentence: 今華德菩薩是。
translation: "Now, this is the Blossom Virtues Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 其淨德夫人，今佛前光照莊嚴相菩薩是，哀愍妙莊嚴王及諸眷屬故於彼中生。
translation: The Lady of Pure Virtue, who is now the Bodhisattva Shining Vairocana before the Buddha, was born there because of compassion for the King of Marvelous Adornment and his retinue.

source_sentence: 其二子者，今藥王菩薩、藥上菩薩是。
translation: The two sons are the present-day Yakṣa King and Yakushō Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 是藥王、藥上菩薩，成就如此諸大功德，已於無量百千萬億諸佛所殖眾德本，成就不可思議諸善功德。
translation: These Medicine King and Yakushō Bodhisattva have accomplished such great virtues that they have already cultivated unfathomable good qualities in the innumerable hundreds of thousands of millions of buddhas with their numerous merits.

source_sentence: 若有人識是二菩薩名字者，一切世間諸天人民，亦應禮拜。」
translation: If anyone knows the names of these two bodhisattvas, the gods and people of the world should also venerate them."

source_sentence: 佛說是〈妙莊嚴王本事品〉時，八萬四千人遠塵離垢，於諸法中得法眼淨。
translation: When the Buddha spoke this Sutra of the Skills of the Adorned King, 84,000 people became dustless and spotless and attained purification of the Dharma eye among all dharmas.

source_sentence: 添品妙法蓮華經普賢菩薩勸發品
translation: Appended Chapter of the Sutra of the Lotus of the Wonderful Dharma Bhadrapāla Bodhisattva's Exhortation to Give Rise to the Dharma

source_sentence: 第二十六
translation: number twenty-six

source_sentence: 爾時普賢菩薩，以自在神通威德名聞，與大菩薩無量無邊不可稱數，從東方來，所經諸國普皆震動，雨寶蓮華，作無量百千萬億種種伎樂；又與無數諸天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿修羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽、人非人等大眾圍遶，各現威德神通之力，到娑婆世界耆闍崛山中，頭面禮釋迦牟尼佛，右繞七匝白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the Bodhisattva Samantabhadra, renowned for his unimpeded supernormal powers and authoritative qualities, along with an incalculable and limitless number of great bodhisattvas, came from the east, and all the countries they passed through were shaken, rained down jeweled lotus flowers, and made measureless hundreds of thousands of millions of kinds of music; and surrounded by countless gods, dragons, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, humans and non-humans, they each manifested the power of their authoritative and supernormal abilities and went to the Gṛdhrakūṭa mountain in the Saṃbha world, bowed their heads to Śākyamuni Buddha, circled him seven times to his right, and said to him, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我於寶威德上王佛國，遙聞此娑婆世界說《法華經》，與無量無邊百千萬億諸菩薩眾共來聽受。
translation: In the Buddha Land of Jeweled Power, I've heard the Lotus Sutra explained in the Saha world from afar, and I've heard it accepted by a hundred thousand million bodhisattvas from an infinite and limitless multitude of people.

source_sentence: 唯願世尊，當為說之，若善男子善女人，於如來滅後，云何能得是《法華經》？」
translation: May it please the Bhagavān, who will explain it for us, if good sons and good women can attain this Lotus Sutra after the Tathāgata's extinction?"

source_sentence: 佛告普賢菩薩：「若善男子、善女人，成就四法，於如來滅後當得是《法華經》：一者、為諸佛護念，二者、殖諸德本，三者、入正定聚，四者、發救一切眾生之心。
translation: The Buddha told Samantabhadra, "If good sons and good women accomplish four things, they will attain this Sutra of the Dharma Flower after the Tathāgata's death: first, they will guard the mind of the buddhas, second, they will cultivate the roots of virtue, third, they will enter the cluster of right concentration, and fourth, they will arouse the intention to save all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 善男子善女人，如是成就四法，於如來滅後必得是經。」
translation: Good sons and good women, if you thus accomplish these four things, you will surely attain this sūtra after the Tathāgata's extinction."

source_sentence: 爾時普賢菩薩白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the Bodhisattva Samantabhadra said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 於後五百歲濁惡世中，其有受持是經典者，我當守護除其衰患令得安隱，使無伺求得其便者，若魔、若魔子，若魔女、若魔民，若為魔所著者，若夜叉、若羅剎，若鳩槃荼、若毘舍闍，若吉遮、若富單那，若韋陀羅等諸惱人者，皆不得便。
translation: "In the next five hundred years of the turbid and evil world, if someone accepts this sūtra, I will guard them, remove their troubles, and make them comfortable, so that no one who seeks to get an advantage over them will be able to get an advantage over Māra, Māra's son, Māra's daughter, Māra's people, anyone attached to Māra, Yakṣa, Rāṣṭrapāṇa, Kumbhāṇḍa, Viśāca, Kṛtyā, Pūtanā, Vetāla, or any other person who bothers them.

source_sentence: 是人若行、若立讀誦此經，我爾時乘六牙白象王，與大菩薩眾俱詣其所而自現身，供養守護安慰其心，亦為供養《法華經》故。
translation: If someone walks or stands and recites this sūtra, I'll ride the six-tusked white elephant king with a large group of bodhisattvas to their place and present myself to them, offering support, guarding, and comforting their minds, and for the sake of making offerings to the Lotus Sutra.

source_sentence: 是人若坐思惟此經，爾時我復乘白象王，現其人前。
translation: If that person sits down and contemplates this sūtra, then I'll again ride the white elephant king and show myself to them.

source_sentence: 其人若於此《法華經》，有所忘失一句一偈，我當教之與共讀誦，還令通利。
translation: If that person forgets a single verse or sentence of the Lotus Sutra, I'll teach them to recite it together and return it to me for further improvement.

source_sentence: 爾時受持讀誦《法華經》者，得見我身，甚大歡喜轉復精進，以見我故，即得三昧及陀羅尼，名為旋陀羅尼、百千萬億旋陀羅尼、法音方便陀羅尼，得如是等陀羅尼。
translation: At that point, the person who accepts and recites the Lotus Sutra and sees me in person is overjoyed and resumes his effort, and because he sees me, he attains samādhi and dhāraṇī called the revolving dhāraṇī, the hundred thousand million revolving dhāraṇī, and the dhāraṇī of the Dharma voice of skillful means, and attains such dhāraṇī.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若後世後五百歲濁惡世中，比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷，求索者、受持者、讀誦者、書寫者、欲修習是《法華經》者，於三七日中應一心精進，滿三七日已，我當乘六牙白象，與無量菩薩而自圍遶，以一切眾生所憙見身現其人前，而為說法示教利喜。
translation: "If in the next five hundred years of the turbid evil age, monks, nuns, laymen, or laywomen who seek, accept, recite, or write this Lotus Sutra should concentrate their minds on it for thirty-one days, then after the thirty-seven days are up, I'll ride around in a six-tusked white elephant with measureless bodhisattvas, present myself to all sentient beings in a body that they are proud to see, and explain the teaching and bring benefit and joy to them.

source_sentence: 亦復與其陀羅尼呪，得是陀羅尼故，無有非人能破壞者，亦不為女人之所惑亂，我身亦自常護是人。
translation: I'll also give them a dhāraṇī spell; because I have obtained this dhāraṇī, there's no one who can break it, and I won't be confused by a woman, and I myself will always protect this person.

source_sentence: 惟願世尊！
translation: May it be so, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 聽我說此陀羅尼。」
translation: Listen to me as I explain this dhāraṇī."

source_sentence: 若有菩薩，得聞是陀羅尼者，當知普賢神通之力，若《法華經》行閻浮提有受持者，應作是念：『皆是普賢威神之力。』
translation: If there are bodhisattvas who hear this dhāraṇī, they should know the power of Samantabhadra's supernormal abilities, and if the Lotus Sutra is practiced in Jambudvī and adhered to, they should think, 'It's all because of Samantabhadra's authoritative power.'

source_sentence: 若有受持讀誦正憶念解其義趣如說修行，當知是人行普賢行，於無量無邊諸佛所深種善根，為諸如來手摩其頭。
translation: If someone accepts, recites, correctly recites, understands its meaning and aims, and cultivates it as explained, they should know that this person's practice of Samantabhadra profoundly plants good roots in measureless and limitless buddha-places and rubs their hands on their heads for the tathāgatas.

source_sentence: 若但書寫，是人命終，當生忉利天上，是時八萬四千天女，作眾伎樂而來迎之，其人即著七寶冠，於婇女中娛樂快樂。
translation: If he only writes, then when his life ends, he'll be born in the Heaven of Thirty-three, where 84,000 goddesses make multitudes of music to welcome him, and he'll be wearing a crown of seven treasures and entertaining and delighting in the company of women.

source_sentence: 何況受持、讀誦、正憶念、解其義趣、如說修行。
translation: How could he not accept, recite, correctly recall, understand their meaning, and practice them as they've been taught?

source_sentence: 若有人受持、讀誦、解其義趣，是人命終為千佛授手，令不恐怖，不墮惡趣，即往兜率天上彌勒菩薩所。
translation: If someone retains, recites, and understands their meaning and purpose, that person's hand will be given by a thousand buddhas at the end of their life, so that they won't be afraid and won't fall into a bad destiny, and they'll go up to Maitreya Bodhisattva in Tuṣita Heaven.

source_sentence: 彌勒菩薩有三十二相大菩薩眾所共圍遶，有百千萬億天女眷屬，而於中生。
translation: Surrounded by a great multitude of bodhisattvas in thirty-two forms, Maitreya is joined by a hundred thousand million women from among the gods.

source_sentence: 有如是等功德利益，是故智者應當一心自書，若使人書，受持、讀誦、正憶念、如說修行。
translation: Because of such merits and benefits, a wise person should single-mindedly write this on his own, or if he causes someone else to write it, memorize it, recite it, correctly recall it, and practice it as it's spoken.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我今以神通力守護是經，於如來滅後閻浮提內，廣令流布使不斷絕。」
translation: Now, with my supernormal powers, I will guard this sūtra and cause it to be widely disseminated in Jambudvīpa after the Tathāgata's disappearance so that it won't be cut off."

source_sentence: 爾時釋迦牟尼佛讚言：「善哉，善哉！
translation: It was then that Śākyamuni Buddha praised him, "Good, good!

source_sentence: 普賢！
translation: Samantabhadra!

source_sentence: 汝能護助是經，令多所眾生安樂利益，汝已成就不可思議功德，深大慈悲，從久遠來，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提意，而能作是神通之願，守護是經，我當以神通力守護能受持普賢菩薩名者。
translation: You've accomplished unfathomable virtue, profound compassion, and the resolve to attain perfect enlightenment since long ago, and you're able to make this miraculous vow to guard this sūtra, so I will guard those who can bear the name of Samantabhadra Bodhisattva with their miraculous powers.

source_sentence: 「普賢！
translation: "Samantabhadra!

source_sentence: 若有受持、讀誦、正憶念、修習、書寫是《法華經》者，當知是人則見釋迦牟尼佛，如從佛口聞此經典；當知是人供養釋迦牟尼佛；當知是人佛讚善哉；當知是人為釋迦牟尼佛手摩其頭；當知是人為釋迦牟尼佛衣之所覆；如是之人不復貪著世樂，不好外道經書手筆，亦復不憙親近其人，及諸惡者，若屠兒、若畜、猪羊、鷄狗、若獵師、若衒賣女色，是人心意質直，有正憶念有福德力；是人不為三毒所惱，亦不為嫉妬、我慢、邪慢、增上慢所惱；是人少欲知足，能修普賢之行。
translation: If someone accepts, recites, correctly recites, cultivates, and writes this Lotus Sutra, they should know that they then see Śākyamuni Buddha and hear this sūtra from his mouth; they should know that they make offerings to Śākyamuni Buddha; they should know that they are praised as good by the Buddha; they should know that they rub their head in the hands of Śākyamuni Buddha; they should know that they are covered by Śākyamuni Buddha's robes; such a person doesn't crave worldly pleasures, doesn't use the writing hand of non-Buddhist scriptures, and doesn't get jealous of people or evil people like butchers, animals, pigs, sheep, dogs, hunters, or women who sell sex.

source_sentence: 「普賢！
translation: "Samantabhadra!

source_sentence: 若如來滅後後五百歲，若有人見受持、讀誦《法華經》者，應作是念：『此人不久當詣道場破諸魔眾，得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，轉法輪、擊法鼓、吹法螺、雨法雨，當坐天、人大眾中師子法座上。』
translation: If someone sees, accepts, and recites the Lotus Sutra during the next 500 years after the Tathāgata's death, they should think, 'Soon this person will go to the site of enlightenment and refute the multitude of Māra, attain unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment, turn the Dharma wheel, beat the Dharma drum, blow the Dharma conch, and rain down the Dharma rain, and will sit on the Dharma throne of the lion among the gods and great multitudes.'

source_sentence: 「普賢！
translation: "Samantabhadra!

source_sentence: 若於後世，受持、讀誦是經典者，是人不復貪著衣服、臥具、飲食、資生之物，所願不虛，亦於現世得其福報。
translation: If someone accepts and recites these sūtras in a later life, that person will no longer cling to clothing, bedding, food, or things that provide for life, and their wishes won't be in vain; they'll also attain their merit in the present life.

source_sentence: 若有人輕毀之，言：『汝狂人耳，空作是行終無所獲。』
translation: If someone despises them, they'll say, 'You're crazy! You'll never get anything from doing this in vain!'

source_sentence: 如是罪報，當世世無眼。
translation: The result of such a sin will be invisible from generation to generation.

source_sentence: 若有供養讚歎之者，當於今世得現果報。
translation: If someone makes offerings to it and praises it, they'll attain its present rewards in the present life.

source_sentence: 若復見受持是經者，出其過惡。
translation: If he also sees and retains this sūtra, he'll be shown the error of his ways.

source_sentence: 若實若不實，此人現世得白癩病，若有輕笑之者，當世世牙齒踈缺，醜脣平鼻手腳繚戾，眼目角睞身體臭穢，惡瘡膿血水腹短氣，諸惡重病。
translation: Whether it's true or not, this person will get leprosy in the present life, and if he laughs lightly at it, he'll have missing teeth, an ugly lip and flat nose, crooked hands and feet, eyes and horns, a foul-smelling body, bad sores and pus, blood, water, abdominal shortness of breath, and other serious illnesses in the future life.

source_sentence: 是故普賢！
translation: Therefore, Samantabhadra!

source_sentence: 若見受持是經者，當起遠迎當如敬佛。」
translation: If you see and uphold this sūtra, you will rise from afar to greet it as you venerate the Buddha."

source_sentence: 說是〈普賢勸發品〉時，恒河沙等無量無邊菩薩，得百千億旋陀羅尼，三千大千世界微塵等諸菩薩，具普賢道。
translation: When this Chapter of Encouragement of Samantabhadra was taught, measureless and limitless bodhisattvas like the Ganges River Sands attained ten thousand billion whirling dhāraṇīs, and bodhisattvas like the three thousand great thousand worlds of dust were endowed with the path of Samantabhadra.

source_sentence: 添品妙法蓮華經囑累品第二十七
translation: Appended Chapter Twenty-seven of the Sutra of the Lotus of the Wonderful Dharma's Exhortation to Accumulate

source_sentence: 爾時釋迦牟尼佛，從座而起現大神力，以右手摩無量菩薩摩訶薩頂，而作是言：「我於無量百千萬億阿僧祇劫，修集是難得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提法，今以付囑汝等，汝等應當一心流布此法廣令增益。」
translation: It was then that Śākyamuni Buddha rose from his seat, manifested great supernormal powers, and with his right hand he moistened the heads of measureless bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas and said, "I have cultivated this difficult-to-obtain unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment over measureless hundreds of thousands of millions of incalculable eons, and now I'm entrusting it to you, so you should wholeheartedly disseminate this teaching and make it more widely available."

source_sentence: 如是三摩諸菩薩摩訶薩頂，而作是言：「我於無量百千萬億阿僧祇劫，修集是難得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提法，今以付囑汝等，汝當受持、讀誦、廣宣此法，令一切眾生普得聞知。
translation: Thus, the three bodhisattvas mahāsattva heads said, "I've cultivated this difficult-to-obtain unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment teaching for measureless hundreds of thousands of thousands of incalculable eons, and I'm entrusting it to you, so you must accept, recite, and proclaim it so that all sentient beings will hear and know it.

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 如來有大慈悲，無諸慳悋，亦無所畏，能與眾生佛之智慧、如來智慧、自然智慧。
translation: The Tathāgata has great compassion, is free of stinginess, has no fear, and can give sentient beings the wisdom of buddhas, the wisdom of tathāgatas, and natural wisdom.

source_sentence: 如來是一切眾生之大施主，汝等亦應隨學如來之法，勿生慳悋，於未來世，若有善男子、善女人信如來智慧者，當為演說此《法華經》使得聞知，為令其人得佛慧故。
translation: As the Tathāgata is the great donor of all sentient beings, you too should follow the Tathāgata's teaching and not be stingy. In future generations, if there are good men and good women who believe in the Tathāgata's wisdom, they will explain the Lotus Sutra for them so that they can hear and understand it, in order to help them attain the Buddha's wisdom.

source_sentence: 若有眾生不信受者，當於如來餘深法中示教利喜。
translation: If there are sentient beings who don't believe and accept it, they'll be shown the rest of the Tathāgata's profound teachings for their benefit and joy.

source_sentence: 汝等若能如是，則為已報諸佛之恩。」
translation: If you can do this, you've already repaid the buddhas for their kindness."

source_sentence: 時諸菩薩摩訶薩聞佛作是說已，皆大歡喜遍滿其身，益加恭敬曲躬低頭，合掌向佛俱發聲言：「如世尊勅，當具奉行。
translation: After hearing what the Buddha said, the bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas were overjoyed and filled their bodies with joy, increased their respect, bent their heads, put their palms together, and vocalized to the Buddha, "As the Bhagavān has commanded, I will fully approve of it.

source_sentence: 唯然，世尊！
translation: Yes, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 願不有慮。」
translation: May there be no misgivings."

source_sentence: 諸菩薩摩訶薩眾，如是三反俱發聲言：「如世尊勅當具奉行。
translation: Thus, the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and others all spoke up three times and said, "I will fully approve of your commands, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 唯然，世尊！
translation: Yes, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 願不有慮。」
translation: May there be no misgivings."

source_sentence: 爾時釋迦牟尼佛，令十方來諸分身佛各還本土，而作是言：「諸佛各隨所安，多寶佛塔還可如故。」
translation: It was then that Śākyamuni Buddha caused the fragmentary buddhas from ten directions to return to their homelands and said, "Each Buddha follows his or her place of abiding, and the multi-bodied stūpa can be returned as before."

source_sentence: 說是語時，十方無量分身諸佛坐寶樹下師子座上者，及多寶佛，并上行等無邊阿僧祇菩薩大眾，舍利弗等聲聞四眾，及一切世間天人阿修羅等，聞佛所說皆大歡喜。
translation: When he spoke these words, the measureless number of partial-body buddhas in the ten directions who were sitting on the lion's seat under the jeweled tree, the Prabhūtaratna Buddhas, the boundless incalculably large assembly of bodhisattvas who had ascended, the four śrāvaka congregations like Śāriputra, and all the gods, humans, and asuras of the world were all greatly elated when they heard what the Buddha taught.
